channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1801] Mind = Blown (PIC)
item.description: On a similar note, I always wonder what blind people (born that way) dream about.

item.title: [+1121] Judge Slams RIAA, $675k Fine Ruled Unconstitutional
item.description: Another break happened today in the RIAA’s case against Boston University student Joel Tenenbaum, as the $675k fine was reduced by 90%. The judge in the case criticised the RIAA and held that the jury’s damages were unconstitutional. Even the reduced fine is described as “severe, even harsh” by the District Judge.

item.title: [+970] Sumo Wrestling [GIF]
[+962] LeBron James Is Not Much Of A Reader (PIC)
[+950] Experienced Potheads Show No Change In Task Performance
item.description: If you're going to smoke pot, for goodness' sakes, smoke it every day, man. Experienced marijuana consumers show virtually no changes in cognitive performance after using cannabis, according to clinical trial data published online this week.

item.title: [+867] I Feel Safe Now (PIC)
item.description: Tallahassee & Columbus have been spotted in real life...

item.title: [+757] Taking lazy to new depths (pic)
[+749] Elderly man facing serious charges for shooting at thieves
item.description: Admitted thieves are going free, while an elderly Wheat Ridge man is facing the possibility of spending the rest of his life behind bars, all, he says, for trying to defend his property and his life.

item.title: [+632] Night Owls are smarter than other people
item.description: Because the nocturnal lifestyle allowed by electricity didn't exist 10,000 years ago, we must now rely on general intelligence to override our early-to-bed instincts. So those with more of it stay up later. How much later? Read on...

item.title: [+622] Casual vs. Hardcore vs. Dwarf Fortress (REVISITED)
[+618] Female teachers found drunk, partially naked in high school
item.description: A New York high school fired two female teachers who were found one recent evening allegedly drunk and at least partially naked in a classroom, officials said. Maintenance reported seeing "a woman lying on the floor naked from the waist up" and a school safety officer summoned to the classroom said the women were "naked," with one "on her knees."

item.title: [+595] If Video Games Had Super Easy Mode (Video)
[+518] Animator Going to Hell: King Leonidas VS Chuck Norris (VID)
item.description: This is the epic battle between two mightiest warriors in history. King Leonidas, the brave King of Sparta who defied a 'God' of Persia at the assault for the invasion of Sparta. Chuck Norris, the most talked about hero. Is it a lie?

item.title: [+518] 6 People Who Turned a Life of Crime Into Legitimate Careers
item.description: These people not only managed to have successful careers as criminals, but also turned their nefarious ways into legitimate profit after being arrested.

item.title: [+474] Daniel Tosh surpasses Stewart, Colbert in ratings
item.description: Tosh.0 is now the biggest show in Comedy Central...

item.title: [+450] Why Team Fortress 2 needs a /dance command [VIDEO]
item.description: Professional game animator James Benson has developed some videos which shows the characters of Team Fortress 2 dancing. Watch the videos below, the "awesomeness" factor increases as you reach the last video.

item.title: [+439] Zach Anner Got Fucked...
[+417] Where LeBron Really Belongs (PIC)
item.description: Betrayed Cleveland fans react to LeBron's decision to go to South Beach.

item.title: [+415] Daily Show's Olivia Munn Investigates Arizona's New Law
item.description: Olivia is really living up to her new Daily Show correspondent status with hard hitting facts like this quote from Ben Franklin. "That guy looks Mexican. Let's arrest him."

item.title: [+402] Cop Nice Enough to Drive Drunk Girl Home but then... (Vid)
item.description: Does anyone fiend for beer THIS much? Apparently.
